subject: About Tax and Delivery
description_text:
Hi,
I want to order your products to Germany if it is possible. I have question if you let me.
-I’m looking forward to buy the products on picture, which is in the attachment. I wonder, I have got what I want and wanna make sure for price etc.Two haptics for the gas and brake, Powers Supply; gas and brake pedal with control box. That’s all I need right? 
Sorry for the question but I have to ask to make sure to not waste money. 
Kind regards,Kagan

conversations.body_text:
Hi again,
Sorry to make you busy  I added the wrong picture in first mail,. This is the right one with the pedal I’m looking for with haptics.
Hopefully, everything is clear.
Best regards,Kagan 




Пользователь среда, июня 4, 2025, 8:16 PM написал Kagan SULEYMANOGLU <ksuleymanoglu@yahoo.com>:

Hi,
I want to order your products to Germany if it is possible. I have question if you let me.
-I’m looking forward to buy the products on picture, which is in the attachment. I wonder, I have got what I want and wanna make sure for price etc.Two haptics for the gas and brake, Powers Supply; gas and brake pedal with control box. That’s all I need right? 
Sorry for the question but I have to ask to make sure to not waste money. 
Kind regards,Kagan

Hi Kagan SULEYMANOGLU,  Currently, the PlusX is required to support the vibration feedback motor. If you are using the Pro Plus, you’ll need to purchase the PlusX control box separately. Additionally, the motor requires a 24V power supply. By default, we ship the US plug version. If you need a European plug, please leave a note in your order.
